caption: A green lizard holding a banana leaf waved a yellow sword on the beach. Shortly after, he began playing the guitar. He held the upper half of a doll. A car was driving on the road when suddenly, there was a car accident. It turns out the lizard had been in an aquarium moments ago. During the accident, the fish from the aquarium flew out, and its fragments scattered across the highway. The lizard attempted to help a pangolin he saw on the road, but he was quickly hit by an approaching vehicle, once again landing in the sand.

global.question: Are there more then three different backgrounds appearing in the video?
Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
When does it happens in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?
Does it happen during day or night?

breakpoint.question: What color is the clothes of the green animal?
